 function average(l, field) {
+  return mean(l.map(function (r) {return r[field];}));
+}
+
+function sum(lst) {
   var sum = 0;
-  l.forEach(function (e) {sum += e[field];});
-  return sum / l.length;
+  lst.forEach(function (e) {sum += e;});
+  return sum;
+}
+
+function mean(lst) {
+  return sum(lst) / lst.length;
+}
+
+function stdev(lst) {
+  var m = mean(lst);
+  return Math.sqrt(
+    sum(lst.map(function (e) {return (e - m) * (e - m);}))
+      / (lst.length - 1));
 }
